programme.title: Dhamaal
programme.desc: Four slack and vagabond conmen learn about a hidden treasure from a dying thief and race against time to claim it. Meanwhile, they are also being pursued by a determined police inspector who is hell-bent on finding the treasure and keeping it all to himself.

programme.title: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
programme.desc: During the British Raj, upon witnessing the atrocities of the British, Bhagat Singh grows up to be a fierce freedom fighter. His publicised ideas of revolution bring him to as much popularity as Mahatma Gandhi amongst Indians.

programme.title: Deadline: Sirf 24 Ghante
programme.desc: A renowned surgeon Dr. Viren’s daughter gets kidnapped and the abductors demand a hefty ransom within 24 hours. Even after abiding their rules and delivering the money, the kidnappers vanish with the money and Anishka, leaving Dr. Viren in distress.

programme.title: Waqt Ki Awaz
programme.desc: Lata runs away from home in order to avoid an arranged marriage fixed by her father. She chances upon and falls in love with a truck driver named Vishwa but she is left devastated when he gets arrested for murdering a man.

programme.title: Dil
programme.desc: Raja, and Madhu, two college-going youngsters, fall in love, and, defying their parents' disapproval, get married. They start to build an affectionate and happy married life together. However, their parents are not done trying to separate them.

programme.title: Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega…
programme.desc: Jahnvi’s best friend Pooja attempts suicide when her boyfriend jilts her. Raj, a struggling singer, saves Pooja but she still goes into a coma and Raj gets stuck into caring for her. Upon recovery, Pooja falls for Raj, but he is in love with Jahnvi.

programme.title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
programme.desc: The story revolves around the lives of four guys named Gopal, Lucky, Madhav, and Laxman who all absurdly fall for the same girl. Hence, begins the hilarious race to win her heart.

programme.title: Golmaal Returns
programme.desc: Gopal’s life hits choppy waters when he gets stuck on a yacht for a night upon rescuing an attractive young woman by fighting off some goons. Now, he has his wife suspecting him of having an affair and a police officer on his tail.
